recommendations: “I'm happy to recommend Yash as a proactive, hard working, creative and passionate individual. Yash helps me as the Chief of Staff for Growth Advisory work and with InsightsAlley work earlier. Yash is a very good generalist operator. He is able to get almost all aspects of business and is able to do any type of specialist work as well. He does his work in a methodical way and is able to anticipate the needs of customer, asking questions proactively. He does not live, think or work in a predetermined or limited box but constantly looks at ways of redefining it and removing such limitations. I wish him the best with his startup endeavours.” Show less

honors_and_awards.title: Best Startup of the Year Award - Agritech, Cleantech and Biotech Segment
honors_and_awards.description: Best startup for the year in Agri, Clean and Biotech segment of Local Startups Meet 2020.

honors_and_awards.title: Winner - Dishathon 2020 (Team Hackoverflow)
honors_and_awards.description: Problem Statement - enhance user experience and features of Watcho to increase user engagement, content consumption and subscriptions. Solution - Built synchronized video playback script for Watcho apps across Web/Android/TV/AndroidTV platforms to host watch parties (built on React) with a linked android application (built on React Native) for real-time chat with group text (Socket.io) and audio/video chat (WebRTC). Won INR 50k being the winner among 1000+… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: 1st Runner Up - MapmyIndia Hackathon'20
honors_and_awards.description: Second position among 20+ teams, Built algorithms and software using MapmyIndia APIs for Adaptive Traffic Lights, Navigation optimization and Accident Identification.

honors_and_awards.title: Second Position - TFT Track : Empresario'20
honors_and_awards.description: Won a cash Prize Money of 1 Lakh INR in by securing 2nd position in TFT track among a total of 900+ startups. Also, Sponsored by Founder's Bootcamp, got a chance to pitch at Finale of Founder's Bootcamp for $50,000 in Los Angeles.

honors_and_awards.title: Silver in Case Study Competition
honors_and_awards.description: Analysed Avenues of Growth for an Investment Firm catering Financial Markets and the Mutual Fund Industry, thereby developing strategies for the Expansion of Sales. It comprised of the historical data of Investing Service Firm and a Consulting LLP along with their fall downs to build the case.
